1.details: Perform final frontend test to confirm the client creation functionality is working end-to-end after the backend RLS fixes.

2.content: Enhance Claim Intake Form with Missing Insurance Fields
2.details: Add missing critical insurance policy fields to the claim intake wizard: 1) Policy Details section (Effective/Expiration dates, Policy Type, Form Type), 2) Coverage Information section (Coverage A-D amounts, Additional Coverages), 3) Deductibles section (All Other Perils, Wind/Hail, Hurricane, Earthquake, Flood), 4) Enhanced Policy Status options, 5) Alternative Dispute Resolution options (Mediation, Arbitration, Appraisal, Litigation)

3.details: Address the Address Autocomplete functionality that was identified in the previous audit as having issues.
